marklogic.body:
War is a very lucrative business so no war is ever over. Not if they can help it. Not the drug war, or the terrorism war, or the Cold War... or the War on Christmas. Â :)
Wars ebb and flow on how much the public paying for the wars will take, but what about us trying to place a ring of missile bases around Russia tells you the Cold War is over? The Cold War is on low Tide, sure, because Iraq and Afghanistan, and now Iran and Syria, have us by the balls but it's certainly NOT over.
